turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: The pain does change when I stand, when I stand it's less of a sharp pain, but when I sit that's when the pain is more noticeable.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Okay, that's useful information. It might be related to your posture when sitting. Perhaps try adjusting your chair or adding lumbar support. Does that make any difference?

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: No, I don't think so because my chair is quite too soft.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Yes, a soft chair might not provide enough support, especially for your back. That could definitely contribute to the pain, perhaps try a firmer chair, or add a cushion for better support.
